mapper.select: SELECT bmid.pi_id, bmid.material_code, bmid.material_name, ssc.id, uf.url, sd.band_code, ( SELECT b.band_name FROM t_basicsdatum_band b WHERE b.`code` = sd.band_code GROUP BY b.`code` ) AS band_name, ssc.style_no, ssc.design_no, ssc.color_name, ssc.color_specification, ssc.sales_type, ssc.is_trim, ssc.principal_style, bmid.prod_category_name, bmid.prod_category2nd_name, bmid.prod_category3rd_name FROM t_style_color ssc LEFT JOIN t_style sd ON sd.id = ssc.style_id LEFT JOIN t_upload_file uf ON uf.id = sd.style_pic LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pi.id AS pi_id, sd.design_no AS design_no_two, pi.style_no, pb.material_id, pb.material_code, pb.material_name, pi.prod_category_name, pi.prod_category2nd_name, pi.prod_category3rd_name FROM t_pack_bom pb LEFT JOIN t_pack_bom_version pbv on pbv.id = pb.bom_version_id LEFT JOIN t_pack_info pi ON pi.id = pb.foreign_id AND pi.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN t_style sd ON sd.id = pi.foreign_id AND sd.del_flag = '0' WHERE pb.pack_type = 'packDesign' AND pb.del_flag = '0' AND pb.company_code = #{companyCode} AND pbv.`status` = '1' GROUP BY pi.style_no, sd.design_no ) AS bmid ON bmid.design_no_two = ssc.design_no AND ssc.style_no = bmid.style_no WHERE ssc.del_flag = '0' AND ssc.company_code = #{companyCode} AND bmid.material_id = #{materialId} GROUP BY bmid.design_no_two,bmid.style_no

SELECT id AS sourceId, category_name AS categoryName, supplier_id AS supplierId, supplier_name AS supplierName, part_name AS part, part_code AS partCode, material_name AS materialsName, material_code AS materialsCode, translate AS width, unit_use AS unitNum, unit_code AS unitCode, loss_rate AS lossRate, planning_looss_rate AS planningLoossRate, rated_unit_consumption AS ratedUnitConsumption, purchase_currency AS purchaseCurrency, price AS price, last_time_price AS lastTimePrice, contacts AS contacts, contacts_phone AS contactsPhone, contacts_address AS contactsAddress, workshop_group_code AS workshopGroupCode, workshop_group AS workshopGroup FROM t_pack_bom WHERE del_flag = '0' AND foreign_id = #{foreignId}

SELECT foreign_id, CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN scm_send_flag IN (1, 3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = COUNT(*) THEN '0' WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN scm_send_flag IN (0, 2) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = COUNT(*) THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS send_status FROM t_pack_bom WHERE foreign_id IN
#{id} and pack_type = 'packDesign' and del_flag = '0' and stage_flag = 'packDesign' GROUP BY foreign_id;

select sc.style_no, sc.planning_season_id, tpi.style_id, sc.style_color_pic, sc.color_name, sc.color_specification, sc.colour_library_id, sc.color_code, sc.design_no, sc.seat_design_no, sc.band_code, sc.band_name, sc.supplier, sc.supplier_code, sc.supplier_abbreviation, sc.supplier_no, sc.supplier_color, sc.planning_category_item_id, sc.sender_designer_id, sc.sender_designer_name, sc.color_crash, sc.remarks, t.foreign_id, ts.style_pic, case when tfs.id is not null then '1' else '0' end as choice_flag from (select pb.foreign_id from t_pack_bom pb join t_pack_bom_version pbv on pb.bom_version_id = pbv.id and pbv.del_flag = '0' and pbv.pack_type = 'packBigGoods' where pb.material_code = #{dto.materialCode} and pb.del_flag = '0'group by pb.foreign_id ) t join t_pack_info tpi on tpi.id = t.foreign_id and tpi.del_flag = '0' left join t_style_color sc on tpi.style_color_id = sc.id and sc.del_flag = '0' and sc.bom_status = '1' left join t_fabric_summary_style tfs on sc.style_no = tfs.style_no and tfs.del_flag = '0' left join t_style ts on sc.style_no = ts.style_no and ts.del_flag = '0' where tpi.company_code = #{dto.companyCode}
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
